import React, { Component, Fragment } from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Player, BigPlayButton } from "video-react"; import AppUrl from "../../RestApi/AppUrl"; import RestClient from "../../RestApi/RestClient"; export default class CourseDetails extends Component { constructor(props) { super(); this.state = { myCourseID: props.id, long_title: "", long_des: "", total_lecture: "", total_student: "", project_name: "", }; } componentDidMount() { RestClient.GetRequest(AppUrl.CourseDetails + this.state.myCourseID) .then((result) => { this.setState({ long_title: result[0]["long_title"], long_des: result[0]["long_des"], live_preview: result[0]["live_preview"], img_two: result[0]["img_two"], project_name: result[0]["project_name"], }); }) .catch((error) => {}); } render() { return (

{this.state.long_title}

); } }
